results.title: Outcomes after surgery in patients with diabetes who used metformin: a retrospective cohort study based on a real-world database
results.text_hl: Logistic regression was used to calculate the ORs with 95% CIs for @<m>DISEASE_Postoperative_Complications</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011183 @@@postoperative complications@@@ and 30-day mortality associated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use.

citations.NLM: Lin CS, Chang CC, Yeh CC, Chang YC, Chen TL, Liao CC. Outcomes after surgery in patients with diabetes who used metformin: a retrospective cohort study based on a real-world database BMJ Open Diabetes Res Care. 2020 Nov;8(2):. PMID: 33257420
